Ilang nagbebenta ng tiket sa MRT3, tinamaan din ng COVID-19; operasyon, tigil muna mula July 7 hanggang 11 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-745676 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/745676/ilang-nagbebenta-ng-tiket-sa-mrt3-tinamaan-din-ng-covid-19-operasyon-tigil-muna-mula-july-7-hanggang-11/story/ Umakyat na mahigit 180 ang kawani ng Metro Rail Transit Line 3 (MRT3) ang tinamaan ng COVID-19. Kabilang sa mga dinapuan ng virus ay 11 na nagbebenta ng tiket sa ilang station. Tue, 07 Jul 2020 00:43:02 +0800
COVID-19 imperils AIDS progress, UN warns tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-745729 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/745729/covid-19-imperils-aids-progress-un-warns/story/ COVID-19 could cause an additional half a million AIDS deaths if treatment is disrupted long term, the United Nations said Monday in a warning that the pandemic was jeopardizing years of progress against HIV. Tue, 07 Jul 2020 00:15:08 +0800

Hinagpis ng kaanak ng 15-anyos na babae na pinatay umano ng 2 pulis: 'Ni-rape nila, binaboy nila' tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-745731 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/745731/hinagpis-ng-kaanak-ng-15-anyos-na-babae-na-pinatay-ng-2-pulis-ni-rape-nila-binaboy-nila/story/ xxHindi matanggap ng mga kaanak ang sinapit ng 15-anyos na babae sa Ilocos Sur, na matapos umanong molestiyahin ay pinatay ng mga dalawang pulis na sinampahan nila ng kaniyang pinsan ng reklamo. Mon, 06 Jul 2020 23:24:44 +0800
ABS-CBN chief commits to give public officials chance to air their side tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-745733 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/745733/abs-cbn-chief-commits-to-give-public-officials-chance-to-air-their-side/story/ "As of now, I would like to make a public commitment that any public official will be given airtime on ABS-CBN to express their side on any issue that is being raised against them," ABS-CBN president and CEO Carlo Katigbak said. "That is a commitment by the owners, by the management, and we are instructing our organization today to take note of this instruction," he added. Mon, 06 Jul 2020 23:03:49 +0800
